feed.title: Category: Double Dragon | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Double Dragon (NES, 1988)
entry.content:
I played a bunch of Double Dragon the other day.

This was a really memorable game for me when I was young. However, playing through a bunch of it recently really made it seem pretty lame. I pretty much steam-rolled the game up through the end of Mission 3, but then I was stopped by the hordes of knife enemies. There was really any special about the game and its pace was too glacial for my taste.
